## Description {#details}

<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/filecheck">FileCheck</a> class takes the request and exposes various methods that use information from the request.

## Public Member Functions

### CanonicalizeFile() {#a236b08c46b974292f9ecf297704a06bb}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>StringRef FileCheck::CanonicalizeFile (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/memorybuffer">MemoryBuffer</a> &amp; MB, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectorimpl">SmallVectorImpl</a>&lt; char &gt; &amp; OutputBuffer)</>}>
Canonicalizes whitespaces in the file.

Line endings are replaced with UNIX-style &#39;

&#39;.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/filecheck/filecheck-h/#l00203">203</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/filecheck/filecheck-h">FileCheck.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/filecheck/filecheck-cpp/#l01428">1428</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/filecheck/filecheck-cpp">FileCheck.cpp</a>.

### checkInput() {#a95a7a7f317661b984c86d196fa44dff9}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>bool FileCheck::checkInput (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sourcemgr">SourceMgr</a> &amp; SM, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/stringref">StringRef</a> Buffer, std::vector&lt; <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/filecheckdiag">FileCheckDiag</a> &gt; &#42; Diags=nullptr)</>}>
Checks the input to <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/filecheck">FileCheck</a> provided in the <code>Buffer</code> against the expected strings read from the check file and record diagnostics emitted in <code>Diags</code>.

Errors are recorded against <code>SM</code>.


<SectionUser title="Returns">
false if the input fails to satisfy the checks.
</SectionUser>

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/filecheck/filecheck-h/#l00211">211</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/filecheck/filecheck-h">FileCheck.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/filecheck/filecheck-cpp/#l02674">2674</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/filecheck/filecheck-cpp">FileCheck.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### readCheckFile() {#a20fa01b6cdae5b207cf5dcdda4fced04}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>bool FileCheck::readCheckFile (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sourcemgr">SourceMgr</a> &amp; SM, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/stringref">StringRef</a> Buffer, std::pair&lt; unsigned, unsigned &gt; &#42; ImpPatBufferIDRange=nullptr)</>}>
Reads the check file from <code>Buffer</code> and records the expected strings it contains.

Errors are reported against <code>SM</code>.

If <code>ImpPatBufferIDRange</code>, then the range (inclusive start, exclusive end) of IDs for source buffers added to <code>SM</code> for implicit patterns are recorded in it. The range is empty if there are none.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/filecheck/filecheck-h/#l00196">196</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/filecheck/filecheck-h">FileCheck.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/filecheck/filecheck-cpp/#l01773">1773</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/filecheck/filecheck-cpp">FileCheck.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>
